dataVizCards.title: Time Series Visualization
dataVizCards.description: Charts and data analysis over time
dataVizCards.longDescription: Comprehensive set of visualizations for time series analysis. Includes interactive line charts, seasonal heatmaps, and trend decomposition. Ideal for analyzing historical sales, engagement metrics, and future projections with confidence intervals.

dataVizCards.title: Geographic Dashboards
dataVizCards.longDescription: Dashboards focused on geographic analysis, featuring heat maps, choropleth maps, and flow visualizations between regions. Perfect for analyzing regional sales distribution, logistics, and market expansion.

dataVizCards.title: Correlation Analysis
dataVizCards.longDescription: Set of visualizations to explore and communicate correlations between different business metrics. Includes correlation matrices, interactive scatter plots, and regression analysis with automated insights.

dataVizCards.title: Market Share Analysis
dataVizCards.longDescription: Advanced visualization suite for market share analysis, including treemaps, bubble charts, and competitive positioning matrices. Essential for understanding market dynamics and competitive landscape.

dataVizCards.title: Performance Metrics Dashboard
dataVizCards.longDescription: Real-time dashboard for tracking key performance indicators across multiple dimensions. Features dynamic updates, threshold alerts, and trend indicators for proactive monitoring.

dataVizCards.title: Customer Segmentation Analysis
dataVizCards.longDescription: Advanced visualization toolkit for customer segmentation analysis. Features clustering visualizations, demographic distribution charts, and behavioral pattern analysis tools.

dataVizCards.title: Social Media Analytics
dataVizCards.longDescription: Comprehensive dashboard for social media analytics. Includes engagement metrics, sentiment analysis, reach tracking, and content performance visualization across multiple platforms.

dataVizCards.title: Supply Chain Visualization
dataVizCards.longDescription: Interactive visualization of supply chain operations. Features inventory tracking, logistics flow mapping, bottleneck identification, and optimization opportunity analysis.

featuredCards.title: Sales Dashboard
featuredCards.longDescription: This dashboard provides a comprehensive view of company sales metrics. Includes detailed performance analysis by region, product, and team, as well as temporal trends and forecasts based on historical data. Ideal for strategic decision making and commercial KPI tracking.

featuredCards.title: Customer Analysis
featuredCards.longDescription: An in-depth analysis of our customer profile, including demographic, behavioral, and value-based segmentation. This report presents insights on purchase patterns, lifetime value, and cross-selling opportunities, essential for personalized marketing and sales strategies.

featuredCards.title: Market Intelligence Dashboard
featuredCards.longDescription: Advanced market intelligence dashboard combining competitor analysis, market trends, and industry benchmarks. Features interactive visualizations for market share, pricing analysis, and growth opportunities.

featuredCards.title: Digital Marketing Performance
featuredCards.longDescription: Complete overview of digital marketing performance across all channels. Includes conversion tracking, ROI analysis, campaign performance metrics, and audience engagement insights.

kpiCards.title: Financial Indicators
kpiCards.longDescription: Comprehensive set of financial indicators including profitability, liquidity, debt, and operational efficiency metrics. Presents comparative analysis with industry benchmarks and historical trends.

kpiCards.title: Marketing Metrics
kpiCards.longDescription: Complete digital marketing metrics dashboard, including campaign ROI, conversion funnel, social media engagement, and channel analysis. Enables data-driven strategy optimization.

kpiCards.title: Operational Excellence
kpiCards.longDescription: Comprehensive dashboard tracking operational efficiency metrics, including productivity rates, quality indicators, resource utilization, and process optimization metrics.

kpiCards.title: Customer Success Metrics
kpiCards.longDescription: Detailed analysis of customer success metrics including satisfaction scores, retention rates, support efficiency, and product adoption indicators.

layoutCards.title: Corporate Layout
layoutCards.longDescription: Premium corporate template developed for high-impact executive presentations. Includes over 50 slides with varied layouts, editable charts, and modern design elements. Perfect for annual reports, sales pitches, and stakeholder presentations, maintaining company visual identity.

layoutCards.title: Minimalist Layout
layoutCards.description: Clean and modern design for reports
layoutCards.longDescription: Minimalist and elegant design focused on clarity and readability. This template uses carefully selected typography, strategic white space, and a subtle color palette to create professional and sophisticated presentations. Ideal for technical reports and content-focused presentations.

layoutCards.title: Creative Portfolio
layoutCards.longDescription: Bold and creative template designed for impactful portfolio presentations. Features dynamic layouts, modern typography, and versatile content blocks. Perfect for creative projects, marketing campaigns, and brand presentations.

layoutCards.title: Data Story Layout
layoutCards.longDescription: Specialized template for data-driven storytelling. Includes pre-designed layouts for charts, infographics, and data visualizations with supporting narrative elements. Ideal for research presentations and data analysis reports.

storyboardCards.title: Customer Journey
storyboardCards.longDescription: Detailed visualization of the customer journey, from first contact to loyalty. Maps all touchpoints, emotions, needs, and improvement opportunities at each stage. Fundamental for understanding and optimizing customer experience.

storyboardCards.title: Sales Flow
storyboardCards.longDescription: Complete mapping of the sales process, from prospecting to closing. Includes decision points, team responsibilities, system integrations, and tracking metrics at each stage. Essential for training and optimizing the commercial process.

storyboardCards.title: Product Development
storyboardCards.longDescription: Comprehensive storyboard of the product development lifecycle. Maps ideation, design, development, testing, and launch phases with key stakeholders and deliverables at each stage.

storyboardCards.title: Digital Transformation
storyboardCards.longDescription: Strategic visualization of digital transformation initiatives. Includes technology adoption roadmap, change management processes, and impact assessment frameworks.

trendingCards.title: Sales Dashboard
trendingCards.longDescription: Complete dashboard with detailed sales analysis, including performance metrics, temporal trends, product analysis, and customer segmentation. Provides actionable insights for sales optimization and growth opportunity identification.

trendingCards.title: Customer Analysis
trendingCards.longDescription: In-depth analysis of customer behavior and profile, including value segmentation, purchase frequency, and preferences. Enables identification of consumption patterns, cross-selling opportunities, and personalized retention strategies.

trendingCards.title: Market Intelligence
trendingCards.longDescription: Comprehensive market analysis dashboard featuring competitor benchmarking, market share trends, and industry insights. Essential for strategic planning and competitive positioning.

trendingCards.title: Digital Performance
trendingCards.longDescription: Real-time dashboard tracking performance across digital channels. Includes web analytics, social media metrics, and conversion tracking with automated insights generation.
